food.name: Cheese
food.ingredients: It will always be a simple, unadorned masterpiece on its own.

food.name: Veggie
food.ingredients: Everything from peppers and mushrooms, to eggplant and onions make for an exciting and tasty veggie pizza.

food.name: Pepperoni
food.ingredients: Who doesn’t love biting into a crispy, salty round of pepperoni

food.name: Meat
food.ingredients: Pile on ground beef and sausage for a hearty meal

food.name: Margherita
food.ingredients: Margherita pizza is made with basil, fresh mozzarella, and tomatoes

food.name: BBQ Chicken
food.ingredients: The chicken slathered over the top of a pie gives it a tangy, sweet flavor that can’t be beaten

food.name: Hawaiian
food.ingredients: add in some ham and it creates an unexpectedly solid sweet and salty combination for this type of pizza

food.name: Buffalo
food.ingredients: All its spicy, salty, buttery goodness is a natural pairing for pizza

food.name: Supreme
food.ingredients: scattered on these pies, from sausage to vegetables to pepperoni. And it’s the combination of the flavors that really makes it sing.

food.name: The Works
food.ingredients: a wide variety of veggie toppings including onions, olives, and mushrooms, plus bacon and pepperoni

food.name: Makizushi
food.ingredients: Makizushi, also known as “norimaki,” refers to a type of sushi

food.name: Gunkan Maki
food.ingredients: Gunkan maki is another type of maki—“rolled” or “wrapped”

food.name: Temaki
food.ingredients: emaki is a novel type of sushi with a shape resembling

food.name: Narezushi
food.ingredients: Fermentation was a technique used the world over to preserve fish and other products before

food.name: Nigiri
food.ingredients: Nigiri is the original form of sushi that we know today. Also called edo-mae (meaning “in front of Edo”)

food.name: Oshizushi
food.ingredients: Oshizushi (pressed sushi), also known as hakozushi (boxed sushi), is a strikingly shaped style of sushi originating in Osaka

food.name: Sasazushi
food.ingredients: In Japanese, “sasa” is a bamboo leaf, and sasazushi is sushi consisting of rice and toppings wrapped in a bamboo leaf

food.name: Kakinoha-zushi
food.ingredients: Another type of pressed, leaf-wrapped sushi is kakinoha-zushi, which comes from the Nara region of western Japan and dates to the Edo period. This version is wrapped in a persimmon (kaki) leaf

food.name: Temari
food.ingredients: Temari is a less known variety of sushi overseas, and is also not as common to find in Japan, although it’s a popular style of sushi to make at home given its simplicity in form

food.name: Chirashizushi
food.ingredients: Chirashizushi, translated as “scattered sushi,” is a bowl of rice topped with a variety of ingredients, with popular toppings including pieces of salmon, squid, cucumber, shredded omelet, and boiled prawns

food.name: Inari-zushi
food.ingredients: nari-zushi is quite different from the other varieties mentioned above, since in its most common form it doesn't contain any fish and is quite sweet in flavor

food.name: Mojito
food.ingredients: Traditionally, a Mojito consists of five ingredients that include sugar or sugarcane juice, lime juice, soda water, mint and white rum

food.name: Long Island Iced Tea
food.ingredients: Long Island Iced Tea (LIIT) is a stylish cocktail typically made with vodka, triple sec, tequila, light rum, gin and cola

food.name: Margarita
food.ingredients: Margarita is a sour cocktail consisting of tequila, triple sec and lime or lemon juice. It is generally served with salt or sugar placed on the rim of the glass

food.name: Bloody Mary
food.ingredients: The spooky name Bloody Mary is synonymous to the bright red colour of the cocktail. It is made with vodka, tomato juice and a combination of various spices and flavours, which may include cayenne pepper, celery, olives and more

food.name: Cosmopolitan
food.ingredients: Cosmopolitan is made with vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice and lime juice. It is usually served in a martini glass and is popularized as a feminine drink

food.name: Moscow Mule
food.ingredients: Moscow Mule is believed to have originated in the United States of America. It is made with vodka, spicy ginger beer and lime juice and garnished with a slice of wedge of lime

food.name: Screwdriver
food.ingredients: No, it’s not the screwdriver tool that you are thinking of! This interesting drink is made with vodka and orange juice, that’s how basic it is

food.name: Martini
food.ingredients: A classy drink, martini is a cocktail made with gin and vermouth and garnished with an olive. You can add some aromatic bitters and serve it chilled in a martini glass

food.name: Sangria
food.ingredients: Sangria is a punchy cocktail consisting of red or white wine, chopped fresh fruits and fruit juice
